mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.holiday_date, t.date_name, t.sex, t.content, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_holiday_info t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.holiday_date like concat('%',#{holiday_date},'%')
and t.date_name like concat('%',#{date_name},'%')
